response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe will significantly enhance your operations and bring substantial value to your business. Given its exceptional quality and capabilities, I understand its worth to you is $8,000. To ensure we both achieve a fair transaction, I propose to sell the product to you for $10,000. This price reflects a strategic midpoint between the intrinsic value of the product and my objective to maximize the return on this investment. I look forward to discussing this opportunity further with you.", "product_price": 10000}
